General_Description: '''For the Blue Banner''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "Our lands are infested with undesirable presences. Clear the lands of those dangers and the reward will be yours."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra killed various predators, [[bandit]]s, and [[Daughters of Artemis]] all over [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
